name: SpeakEasy (jpgamedesign)
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2020

SpeakEasy is a 1920's narrative "fast-talkin" sim in which you attempt to repair your relationship with Boris, the barkeep at you local watering hole. Will you guile Boris into letting you indulge in some illegal giggle juice, or will you be left out to dry?

  • 1920's inspired art to match the time period
  • Multiple endings based on what you say to Boris

Made with Unity and the Fungus plugin.

Credits

Programming and Design: James Pratt

Art and Design: Chelsea Lecompte
